description: Corentin Corneau is a french graphic designer based in Paris and sometimes moving to New York. Working as a freelance graphic designer & Art director. Work finds its form in the entire spectrum of visual communication; from magazines, books, printed matter through identities, type design, motion design.
clients: Nike, Chicago Marathon, Some days, Demisch Danant, Alix, Something Special Studio, Bally, Renell Medrano and Ice Studios.
